introduction.title: Contact Me
introduction.body:
To get in touch with me about your contract, use the form below (the more detail the better!) or email me at hello@paulmasek.com.
Please keep in mind, my minimum project rate is around Â£1500.

I look forward to hearing from you!

form.failed:
Message failed to send

Unfortunately it looks like there was a problem sending your message.

Please email me at hello@paulmasek.com instead.
form.success:
Message sent successfully

Thanks for your message.
